page.title: 18Shopping from Hampton Bishop
page.content: When we visited Hampton Bishop we intended to survey the shopping facilities available. For many years the only shops in the village itself have been a general store and a Post Office .In 1974 the two shops were combined and occupied the same premises. On our visit we discovered that this shop has now closed and that the villagers must travel to other places to do their shopping. The local people we interviewed regretted this very much but admitted that they had tended to take the facilities for granted and had not patronised them as much as they might have done. We discovered that the majority of the people now shop in Hereford, but others also travel to Worcester, Mordiford and Withington.
